adjective.description: Of, belonging, or relating to Africa and Asia considered together; specifically designating the group of languages also known as Hamito-Semitic.

noun.description: Something that relates to both Africa and Asia; specifically the group of languages also known as Hamito-Semitic.

origin: Early 20th century. From Afro- + Asian. Compare Afro-Asian, Afro-Asian, Afro-Asiatic, and Eurasian.
